info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 9:11PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Catawba, Alexander, eastern Caldwell and east central Burke Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lenoir, or over Cajah`s Mountain, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hickory, Lenoir, Taylorsville, St. Stephens, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Gamewell, Bethlehem, Hudson and Cajah`s Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
